sectionHero.title: Comprehensive Services at Your Fingertips
sectionHero.subtitle: We offer high-quality and effective comprehensive solutions and services, designed to meet the needs of the health sector, whether in public or private areas

sectionAbout.title: At Oltech, we are committed to offering products that not only meet, but exceed expectations.
sectionAbout.subtitle: About Us
sectionAbout.description: We are dedicated to offering specialized comprehensive services in osteosynthesis, arthroscopy, and joint replacement. Each service is backed by our guaranteed commitment, providing you with peace of mind and confidence in your health and well-being.

1.title: Communication
1.description: We are committed to providing you with prompt customer service, where your inquiries and needs are addressed promptly to ensure your complete satisfaction.

2.title: Shipments
2.description: You can rely on a fast and reliable shipping service with no minimum purchase. From the moment you place your order to delivery at your door.

3.title: Coverage
3.description: With shipping coverage throughout Mexico, we deliver our high-quality products directly to your location with no minimum purchase.

4.title: Attention
4.description: We value each customer as unique. Our personalized attention goes beyond the sale; we strive to understand your individual needs.

sectionWhyChoose.title: Why choose us?
sectionWhyChoose.subtitle: Commitment to excellence.
sectionWhyChoose.description: In a field where precision is crucial, choosing the right supplier can make the difference between success and compliance. At Oltech, we understand the importance of each procedure and strive to be your reliable partner at every step.

sectionContact.title: Contact Us
sectionContact.subtitle: Personalized Experience.
sectionContact.description: Don't let quality be an option. Choose Oltech to ensure exceptional results in every surgery. Contact us today to discuss how we can meet your specific needs.

sectionSocial.title: Follow us
sectionSocial.subtitle: Our Social Networks
sectionSocial.description: Stay up to date with the latest news and updates from Oltech. Follow us on our social networks for information on new products, special offers, and more.

pageAbout.title: Oltech Group Presentation
pageAbout.description: At Oltech S.A. de C.V., we offer the best comprehensive services in the following areas: supply of Osteosynthesis and Joint Replacement Supplies, Hospital Management and Clinical Laboratories, Supply of High-Specialty Healing Materials, as well as Medical Equipment and Technical Support Services to help our clients achieve their health care goals. We are committed to continuous improvement and adherence to legal, regulatory, and organization-specific requirements.

1.title: Mission
1.description: We seek to offer the best comprehensive services and medical supplies, providing products of the highest quality at a good price, offering quick and effective responses to help our clients achieve their health care goals.

2.title: Vision
2.description: To be regional and national leaders in comprehensive services and medical supplies, serving our clients better to preserve health.

sectionObjetives.title: Our Objectives
sectionObjetives.subtitle: Health and Development Committed.
sectionObjetives.description: Provide medical supplies and comprehensive services throughout Mexico. Support the well-being and improvements in health conditions as a result of business activity. Provide our collaborators with the best conditions for their integral development.

sectionAlcance.title: Scope of our services
sectionAlcance.subtitle: All in one provider.
sectionAlcance.description: OLTECH offers comprehensive services in the public and private health sector. It is responsible for being a single provider of the equipment and different technologies contained in an implementation or expansion project.
